Dong Lei | 董磊

2011- Ph. D. Candidate, School of Architecture, Tsinghua University.

Research interest: Spatial Analysis, Urban Economy.
I'm also interested in Complex Science, Python, R.

2011年至今 博士在读 清华大学建筑学院
